name: The Piratescape
description:
You are the pirate Jack Bonny who flees the Navy with your ship but suddenly the rudder of your boat breaks! You will have to use your pirate skills and the Four Winds to get to the Skull Cave to hide from your enemies. ARRR!

W/A/S/D = Movement.

  • A game made for the 'Jam Jam Talentum Online 2017' Game Jam.
